title: [Self-directed] In-Depth Workshop on Understanding the Greenhouse Effect and Global Warming

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts (Heat Transfer, Atmospheric Layer Composition, etc.)
context.additional_context: Environmental education integration capacity-building for language domain applications targeting current practitioners

learning_goals: The physical mechanisms of the greenhouse effect can be explained using at least three scientific terms
The causal relationship between global warming and the greenhouse effect can be presented through a conceptual diagram
Misconceptions about the greenhouse effect can be identified and corrected using examples from daily life
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
